description: Genius introduces the latest device in the Traveler series, Traveler 9010LS, a new wireless DarkEye mouse featuring a double injection grip which naturally conforms to your hand for optimum comfort. The Genius DarkEye technology tracks on surfaces like clear glass and lacquered desks so it works wherever you do. The bi-directional 2.4GHz anti-interference technology ensures a reliable working distance of up to 10 meters. You can adjust the speed and precision of your mouse from 800/1200/1600 dpi. It also has a convenient battery compartment design for either AA or AAA battery. Plus, you can store the super mini receiver inside the mouse to prevent breakage or just leave it in the USB port and forget about it. The Traveler 9010LS is ready to help you fly through any task anywhere you go.
title: Genius 2.4 GHz 1600dpi Laser Mouse for glass surface (Traveler 9010LS)
